6001.name: Sand Attack
6001.effect: Hurl sand at the opponent to lower the target's Accuracy.

6002.name: Burrow
6002.effect: Burrow into the ground and attack the next turn. The user becomes untargetable by all non-Earth typed moves during this turn.

6003.name: Ground Stomp
6003.effect: Strongly stomp down on the ground to strike everything around the user, foes and allies. This move lowers the Speed stats of those hit.

6004.name: Rock Fall
6004.effect: Hurl large boulders at the opponent(s) to inflict damage. This move has a 20% chance of causing the target to flinch.

6005.name: Quake Punch
6005.effect: Strike the target with a powerful punch. This move has a 20% chance of causing the target to flinch.

6006.name: Landslide
6006.effect: Trigger a landslide to bury the target. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target's Speed stat.

6007.name: Earthquake
6007.effect: Set off an earthquake that strikes everyone around the user, foes and allies.

6008.name: Stone Edge
6008.effect: Strike the target with sharp stones. This move has a 30% chance of landing a critical hit.

6009.name: Tectonic Crush
6009.effect: Engulf the target in a massive shockwave from tectonic activity. This move has a 30% chance of lowering the target's Defense stat.

6010.name: Mud Bomb
6010.effect: Hurl a blob of mud at the target to deal damage. This move has a 10% chance of lowering the target's accuracy.

6011.name: Quicksand
6011.effect: Trap the opponent in quicksand, dealing damage and harshly reducing the target's Speed stat.

6012.name: Mudslide
6012.effect: Sends a rushing wave of mud at the opponent, has a 10% chance of lowering the target's Speed stat.

6013.name: Erosion
6013.effect: Gradually wear down the opponent. This move deals 20% increase damage on subsequent hits.

6014.name: Dust Devil
6014.effect: Summon a small tornado of dust and debris to strike the target.

6015.name: Seismic Wave
6015.effect: Send out a wave of seismic energy that damages all opposing foes.

6016.name: Sandstorm
6016.effect: Whip up a fierce sandstorm that damages all combatants for several turns.

6017.name: Sand Trap
6017.effect: Create a trap of shifting sands that makes the opponent unable to escape.

6018.name: Terra Shield
6018.effect: Summon a protective barrier of earth power that reduces damage from physical attacks for several turns.

6019.name: Rock Armour
6019.effect: Harden the user's body with rock, sharply increasing the user's Defense stat.

6020.name: Sharp Spikes
6020.effect: Send sharp spikes to the opposing field, dealing damage to all non-Wind typed opponents when they switch in.

6021.name: Floating Stones
6021.effect: Send floating stones to the opposing field, dealing damage to all non-Earth typed opponents when they switch in.
